Plus, Enron, the seventh largest company in America, collapses due to creative accounting practices and greed that leave the company broke.

programme.title: The Starlet Murder
programme.desc: A young actress lands her big break in Hollywood, but her dreams are cut short when an obsessed fan fatally shoots her. Plus, when New York's elite need an escort they go to her. Meet 'The Mayflower Madam.'

programme.title: A Death In Staten Island
programme.desc: Eric Garner, a Staten Island father of six, is tragically killed when an NYPD officer puts Garner into an illegal chokehold. Plus, Kevin Mitnick is one of the most famous hackers of all time. So famous, in fact, he's hunted by the FBI.

programme.title: The War Criminal
programme.desc: A high-ranking government official authorizes the arrests and subsequent deportations of over 1400 Jews to Nazi concentration camps where most of them perish. Plus, Enron, the seventh largest company in America, collapses due to creative accounting practices and greed that leave the company broke.

programme.title: The Death Doctor
programme.desc: A renown cancer doctor intentionally misdiagnoses thousands of patients with cancer as part of a major insurance scam. Plus, Parmalat falls victim to greed and deceit in one of the biggest instances of financial fraud in Italy's history.

programme.title: Burn Pile Murder Trial
programme.desc: According to prosecutors in their opening statements, money was the motive for this murder. Next, Melody Farris' defense delivered their opening remarks to the jury. They claimed police acted on confirmation bias when they allegedly narrowed erroneously on the defendant for the death of her husband, Gary. A complicated family coupled with a complicated police investigation all led to fingers pointing at Melody Farris for first-degree murder.

programme.desc: Prosecutors were not done yet in bringing to the witness stand hospital personnel who tried to save Corey Micciolo's life. The registered nurse assigned to him recalls taking him in when he was feeling nauseated and too weak to move.

programme.title: Treadmill Abuse Murder Trial
programme.desc: According to the call screener for the State's Child Protection Services the defendant made a call to the their child abuse hotline. After Corey Micciolo lost his life in the hospital, Christopher Gregor skipped town.

programme.title: Treadmill Abuse Murder Trial
